titleInfo.title: Exhibit, Statuettes of God Anubis and Deities

mods.abstract: Exhibit cases of statuettes of God Anubis and Deities at the Gizeh Museum; half human, half jackel, and full jackal form statuettes of Anubis, protector of the dead and embalming and "Guardian of the Scales" (bottom of center case) with statuettes of other deities in surrounding cases (top center, left, right); three long cases, (bottom); untitled print.

titleInfo.title: Nineteenth and Early Twentieth Century Images of Egypt

location.physicalLocation: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Frank H. McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture

mods.note: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Louis Bailey Audigier, McClung Museum of Natural History and Culture, The University of Tennessee
